alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Pike (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 3:01AM EDT until March 29 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River below Big Branch near Molena affecting Meriwether and Pike Counties. For the Flint River Basin...including Molena...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River below Big Branch near Molena. * WHEN...From this morning to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 33 feet, Moderate flooding begins. Flooding continues to expand into the agricultural and wooded areas upstream and downstream from the gage located near the pump station. Significant flooding expands into the agricultural and wooded areas downstream from the gage near the Georgia Highway 74 bridge. Elevated homes in this location will have several feet of water underneath them. Access roads to these homes will be completely flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM EDT Monday the stage was 19.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 31.2 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 28 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
